Translation: Dieses Schloss kann nicht geknackt werden.

Source: Other constructions need to be disassembled first.
Translation: Andere Bauten müssen erst zerlegt werden.

Source:
Save game data incompatible with this version of the mod has been detected. Please start a new campaign or revert the update to continue playing.

Use the "Restart" option in the pause menu or the "Wipe save data" in the admin menu to restart.
Translation:
Spieldaten, die mit dieser Version der Modifikation nicht kompatibel sind, wurden erkannt. Bitte starte eine neue Kampagne oder setze das Update zurück, um weiterzuspielen.

Verwende die Option „Neustart“ im Pausenmenü oder „Spielstände löschen“ im Administratormenü, um neu zu beginnen.

Source: Gives access to weapons and ammunitions belonging to the resistance. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: Gewährt Zugang zu Waffen und Munition des Widerstands. Gegenstände können mit Vorräten gekauft werden.

Source: Gives access to weapons and ammunitions provided by the allied faction. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: Gewährt Zugang zu Waffen und Munition der mit dem Widerstand verbündeten Fraktion. Gegenstände können mit Vorräten gekauft werden.

Source: Place it in a good observation spot.
Translation: Platziere ihn an einem guten Observationspunkt.

Source: Gain access to a resistance officer being present on site.
Translation: Gewährt Zugang zu einem Offizier des Widerstands direkt vor Ort.

Source: Gives access to uniforms and other equipment belonging to the resistance. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: Gewährt Zugang zu Uniformen und Ausrüstung des Widerstands. Gegenstände können mit Vorräten gekauft werden.

Source: Gives access to uniforms and other equipment provided by the allied faction. Items are purchased using supplies.
Translation: Gewährt Zugang zu Uniformen und anderer Ausrüstung der verbündeten Fraktion. Gegenstände können mit Vorräten gekauft werden.

Source: Allows assigning two ground vehicles to prevent them from being lost, and enables retrieving them from far away.
Translation: Erlaubt das Speichern von 2 Bodenfahrzeugen, um ihren Verlust vorzubeugen, und ermöglicht die Rückführung über größere Distanzen.

Source: Allows assigning a single ground vehicle to prevent it from being lost, and enables retrieving it from far away.
Translation: Erlaubt das Speichern von einem einzelnen Bodenfahrzeug um Verlust vorzubeugen, und ermöglicht die Rückführung über größere Distanzen.
Bereite dich auf unerwünschte Gäste vor.

Source: Service helipad allows to assign a single helicopter and enables helicopter refueling and repairing. Can be constructed only in airbases.
Translation: Erlaubt die Zuweisung eines Hubschraubers und ermöglicht Reparatur und Betankung. Kann nur auf Flugplätzen gebaut werden.

Source: Helipad allows to assign a single helicopter, which protects it from being lost and enables retrieving it from far away. Basic version without refueling or repairing abilities.
Translation: Erlaubt die Zuweisung eines Hubschraubers und schützt so vor dem Verlust der Maschine. Ermöglicht auch die Rückführung über größere Distanzen. Basisversion ohne Wartungsmöglichkeit.

Source: Provides living space for a few soldiers that can be recruited.
Translation: Bietet einen Wohnbereich für einige Soldaten, welche rekrutiert werden können.
Heile hier deine Wunden und erhole dich schneller.

Source: Medical tent improves injury regeneration and allows to purchase medical goods using supplies.
Translation: Das Sanitätszelt verbessert die Gesundheitsregeneration und ermöglicht den Kauf von medizinischen Gütern mit Vorräten.

Source: Send a message over long distance.
Translation: Sende eine Botschaft über weite Entfernungen.

Source: Complete mortar emplacement. Projectiles can be purchased using supplies.
Translation: Ausgebaute Mörserstellung. Granaten können mit Vorräten gekauft werden.

Source: Allows to store 900 supplies. First one can be constructed for free.
Translation: Ermöglicht die Lagerung von 900 Vorräten. Der Bau des ersten Lagers ist kostenlos.

Source: Due to missing modding features, the single player and local hosting experience is unavailable on console systems. We suggest setting up a private dedicated server or joining a public one.
Translation: Der Einzelspieler und lokales Hosting sind aufgrund von fehlenden Modding Features auf Konsolen nicht verfügbar. Wir empfehlen dir, entweder einem öffentlichen Server beizutreten, oder einen eigenen dedizierten Server aufzusetzen.

Source:
Restored objects may collide with constructions or vehicles left in place of destroyed objects, causing undesired effects. This is an experimental feature and it is recommended to back up your save.

Once you confirm this action, you have to force save and restart the server for the changes to take effect.
Translation:
Wiederhergestellte Objekte können mit Bauwerken oder Fahrzeugen kollidieren, die sich an den Positionen der zerstörten Objekte befinden, was unerwünschte Effekte verursachen kann. Diese Funktion befindet sich in der Experimentierphase; es wird daher empfohlen, eine Sicherung deines Spielstands anzulegen.

Nachdem du diese Aktion bestätigt hast, musst du den Spielstand erzwingen und den Server neu starten, damit die Änderungen wirksam werden.

Source: Forced save will perform entire save in a single operation, which may block the server on large maps and with a lot of data. This may cause remote players, including you, to lose connection. This does not affect the save operation itself.
Translation: Ein erzwungenes Speichern führt den gesamten Speicherprozess in einem einzigen Vorgang aus, was auf großen Karten oder bei umfangreichen Daten den Server vorübergehend blockieren kann. Dabei kann es vorkommen, dass entfernte Spieler – einschließlich dir – die Verbindung verlieren. Der eigentliche Speicherprozess wird dadurch jedoch nicht beeinträchtigt.

Source:
Are you sure to wipe the campaign save data? After proceeding the scenario will automatically restart.

WARNING: THIS OPERATION CANNOT BE REVERTED. YOU WILL LOSE ALL PROGRESS.
Translation:
Bist du sicher, dass du die gespeicherten Kampagnendaten löschen möchtest? Nach dem Fortfahren wird das Szenario automatisch neu gestartet.

WARNUNG: DIESER VORGANG KANN NICHT RÜCKGÄNGIG GEMACHT WERDEN. ALLE FORTSCHRITTE GEHEN VERLOREN.

Source: Used to identify dead bodies found on the battlefield.
Translation: Wird genutzt, um Leichen auf dem Schlachtfeld zu identifizieren.

Source: Your clothes are bloodied. Wearing them breaks your disguise and makes you attract enemy attention. You should change your clothes or go for a swim.
Translation: Deine Kleidung ist blutverschmiert. Trägst du sie, wird deine Tarnung auffliegen und du erregst die Aufmerksamkeit deiner Feinde. Du solltest deine Kleidung wechseln oder schwimmen gehen.

Source: Your clothes have been cleaned. Wearing them will not make you suspicious anymore.
Translation: Deine Kleidung wurde gereinigt. Sie zu tragen wird keine Aufmerksamkeit mehr erregen.

Source: You will be treated as a combatant when openly carrying weapons or wearing combatant attire. Watch out, as you may become wanted if enemies see you.
Translation: Wenn du offen Waffen oder Kampfkleidung trägst, wirst du wie ein Kombattant behandelt. Pass auf, du wirst möglicherweise zur Fahndung ausgeschrieben, wenn Feinde dich sehen.

Source: You are now wanted by the enemy. Hide in a safe place and remain out of sight for some time to lose the heat.
Translation: Du wirst nun vom Feind gesucht. Verstecke dich an einem sicheren Ort und bleibe eine Zeitlang außer Sicht, um deinen Fahndungslevel loszuwerden.

Source: Set to 0% to remove wanted status.
Translation: Auf 0% setzen, um Gesuchten-Status zu entfernen.

Source: Despite best efforts and heroic fight, %1 has failed to liberate %2. %3 forces are here to stay for a long time. Next time pay more attention to population support and logistics of your revolution. No military effort in history succeeded without these elements.
Translation: Trotz aller Bemühungen und einem heroischen Kampf ist es %1 nicht gelungen, %2 zu befreien. Die Kräfte der %3 werden für eine sehr lange Zeit bleiben. Achte beim nächsten Mal mehr auf die Unterstützung in der Bevölkerung und die Logistik deiner Revolution. Kein militärisches Unterfangen hat ohne diese Bausteine Erfolg gehabt.

Source: Great job! Thanks to the relentless effort made by %1, the population of %2 will no longer be opressed by %3 forces. These heroic acts will be remembered by many generations to come.
Translation: Gute Arbeit! Dank der unermüdlichen Anstrengungen der %1 wird die Bevölkerung von %2 nicht länger von den Kräften der %3 unterdrückt. Diese heroischen Taten werden über Generationen hinweg nicht vergessen.

Source: Use this to wake up incapacitated persons. Can be also self administered.
Translation: Nutze dies, um außer Gefecht gesetzte Personen aufzuwecken. Kann auch selbst verabreicht werden.

Source: One time use injector with a dose of epinephrine.
Translation: Injektor mit einer Dosis Adrenalin. Für einmaligen Gebrauch.

Source:
Different types of armories can be built, depending on the operating base type:
- Allied armory is available at military bases and offers weapons and ammunition of your supporting faction.
- Field armory is available at FOBs and offers weapons and ammunition of the player faction.
Armories allow the purchase of weapons and ammunition using resources stored at the base.
Translation: Waffenkammern ermöglichen den Kauf von Waffen und Munition mit Ressourcen von der Basis.

Source: Command post enables you to have a resistance officer on site, allowing you to hand in dogtags, take posters or missions in your operating base, without the need to travel to a hideout.
Translation: Der Kommandoposten erlaubt es dir, einen Widerstandsoffizier vor Ort zu haben, bei welchem du Dogtags einreichen, sowie Plakate oder Missionen erbitten kannst, ohne zu einem Widerstandsversteck reisen zu müssen.

Source: Equipment stores allow you to purchase uniforms and non-lethal equipment using resources stored at the base.
Translation: Ausrüstungslager ermöglichen den Kauf von Uniformen und nicht-tödlicher Ausrüstung mit den eingelagerten Ressourcen der Basis.

Source:
Different types of stores can be built, depending on the operating base type:
- Allied equipment store is available at military bases and offers equipment of your supporting faction.
- Field equipment store is available at FOBs and offers equipment of the player faction.
To use fast travel, you need to open your map and select the fast travel icon from the tool picker in the upper-left corner of the screen.
Translation: Um die Schnellreise zu nutzen, öffne deine Karte und wähle das Schnellreisesymbol aus der Werkzeugleiste in der oberen linken Ecke des Bildschirms aus.

Source: Fast travel is available only to player-controlled operating bases. It is more expensive than public transport, but it can be performed from any location, even far away from roads and infrastructure. You cannot fast travel while being wanted, but you don’t have to appear as a civilian.
Translation: Die Schnellreise ist nur zu Spieler-kontrollierten Operationsbasen möglich. Sie ist teurer als öffentliche Verkehrsmittel aber kann von jedem Ort aus genutzt werden, auch weit abseits der Straßen und Infrastruktur. Die Schnellreise ist nicht möglich, solange du gesucht wirst, musst allerdings nicht als Zivilist gekleidet sein.

Source: Helipads offer a single parking spot to which helicopters can be assigned, and otherwise they are identical in functionality to garages.
Translation: Hubschrauberlandeplätze bieten einen Parkplatz für Hubschrauber. Sie sind in der Funktionsweise identisch mit Garagen.

Source: Additionally to regular helipads, military bases allow to construct a service helipad, which can be used to repair helicopters.
Translation: Zusätzlich zu regulären Landeplätzen erlauben Militärbasen die Errichtung eines Wartungslandeplatzes, welchen man für die Reparatur von Hubschraubern nutzen kann.

Source: Medical tents offer faster regeneration for freedom fighters residing inside. They are also a source for medical items such as bandages or epinephrine, which can be obtained by spending resources at the tent.

FOBs are field bases and as such, offer fewer capabilities than military bases, and their armory and equipment assortment is limited to resistance assets. However, they can be established very early, before the resistance is strong enough to overtake a military base, and/or may be placed in very advantageous locations.

They are somewhat complementary to FOBs, as they offer more possibilities at the cost of their fixed placement.
Fighters will find here regular army equipment of the allied forces and more construction options.

FOBs can be established by resistance members using the entrenchment tool, via the placement menu. They need to be placed at a sufficient distance from enemy-controlled facilities, towns and other points of interest. You can use FOB Placement map tool to plan the location in advance.
There are two types of operating bases, as described below.
Translation: Es gibt zwei Arten von Operationsbasen, wie unten beschrieben wird.

Source:
Military bases are existing locations in the world, controlled by the enemy. After they are taken over,
they can be used as operating bases.
Translation: Militärbasen sind bestehende Orte in der Spielwelt, welche vom Feind kontrolliert werden. Nach der Übernahme können sie als Operationsbasen genutzt werden.

Source: Operating bases are locations in which resistance members can construct buildings and fortifications, store resources, operate garages, repair and refuel vehicles, and more. If enough resources are stored, an operating base may be used as a respawn location.

Repair stations allow to repair vehicles of relevant category. To repair ground vehicles, build a vehicle maintenance ramp. To repair helicopters, build a service helipad. Follow base game mechanics to carry out the repairs – equip yourself with a wrench and approach the damaged elements until you see a relevant action. The repairs will consume resources stored at the location.
As the resources for construction are pulled from the base pool, the first supply storage in a base can be constructed without spending any resources.
Resources in storage are persistent and do not expire or decay.
Translation: Gelagerte Ressourcen sind persistent und laufen weder ab, noch verfallen sie.

Source: Storages are always the first construction to be raised in an operating base. They store resources of different types and make them available to use within a base. Different to base game supply system, resources in Freedom Fighters are not vicinity based and cannot be used directly from trucks and other sources.
Depending on your difficulty settings, you may see a status icon denoting whether your character is perceived as a combatant.
Translation: Abhängig von deinen Schwierigkeitseinstellungen wirst du möglicherweise ein Statussymbol sehen können, welches dir anzeigt, ob dein Charakter als Kombattant wahrgenommen wird.

Source: The absence of a shirt, pants, or boots will cause your character to attract enemy attention. After all, someone running around in only their underwear is bound to look suspicious.
Translation: Die Abwesenheit eines Oberteils, Hose oder Schuhwerk wird deinen Charakter auf den Feind aufmerksam machen. Immerhin ist es nichts gewöhnliches, wenn jemand nur in seiner Unterwäsche rumläuft.

Source: Appearance reflects how your character is perceived by others and depends on all worn attire and held items. Wearing any piece of military clothing will cause your character to be identified as a combatant. This means enemies will shoot on sight and mark you as wanted — the same applies to openly carrying any type of weapon.
As the base game does not contain any civilian backpacks, the general purpose military ones are not treated as military equipment.
Translation: Da das Basisspiel keine zivilen Rucksäcke beinhaltet, werden die Allzweck-Militärrucksäcke nicht als militärische Ausrüstung geahndet.

Source:
- Deployment phase – The enemy is still deploying onto the battlefield. The progress bar is yellow and represents how much of their forces are already fielded. Once the bar completes, the battle will transition into domination phase.
- Domination phase – The sides fight for control. The progress bar is green and represents resistance control over the location. Control will increase every few moments if there are more freedom fighters in the contested area than enemies in the near vicinity.

Battles occur when control over a certain point of interest is contested. When a battle is won, the contesting faction takes control. Refer to the specific location description to learn how to provoke a battle. Only one battle can be active at any given moment and its progress cannot be saved. If the game is closed during a battle, the battle will need to be started from the beginning. Battle length and intensity depend on the number of players online, campaign progress, location significance, and threat level.
Each battle consists of two phases:
Translation: Jede Schlacht besteht aus zwei Phasen:

Source: If there are no freedom fighters in the contested area, the resistance will begin to rapidly lose control. In this case, the progress bar will turn red. Once the bar fills, the battle will be lost.
Translation: Sollten sich im umkämpften Gebiet keine Freiheitskämpfer befinden, wird der Widerstand schnell die Kontrolle verlieren. In diesem Fall verfärbt sich die Fortschrittsleiste rot. Sobald der Balken voll ist, ist die Schlacht verloren.

Source: Once a battle begins, everyone will see a notification. A progress bar will appear at the top of the screen, accompanied by the location name. The battle location will also be marked on the map, denoting the contested area by a stripe pattern.

- Civilian shops will not serve you
- Resistance representatives may not want to talk to you
- Public transport becomes unavailable
- Resting becomes unavailable
- ...and more.

Various activities may cause your character to become wanted. This means your character is actively hunted by enemy forces and will be shot on sight, even if you appear as a civilian. Being wanted also has many negative side effects, such as:

Heat level is a measure of how much your character is wanted by the enemy. Once it drops to 0, you will no longer be wanted. Heat decreases over time as long as you stay out of sight of enemy troops. Your current heat level is represented by the fill level of the wanted status icon in the HUD. The time required to fully lose maximum heat depends on your difficulty settings.
If your character dies, the heat level and wanted state does not transfer to your new character.
Translation: Wenn dein Charakter stirbt, wird dein Fahndungslevel und dein Gesuchten-Status nicht auf deinen neuen Charakter übertragen.

Source: Visible if your character is considered a combatant. This is caused by carrying weapons, using military vehicles, and wearing military attire — or wearing no attire at all.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn dein Charakter als Kombattant angesehen wird. Dies wird ausgelöst, indem man Waffen offen trägt, Militärfahrzeuge benutzt oder Militärkleidung trägt - oder überhaupt keine Kleidung trägt.

Source: Visible if your character is within an illegal area.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn sich dein Charakter in einer Sperrzone befindet.

Source: Visible if your character is undercover, which means it’s impersonating an enemy soldier.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn dein Charakterundercover ist, das heißt, wenn er sich als ein feindlicher Soldat ausgibt.

Source: Visible when your character is within enemy sight. Pulling out weapons, acting suspiciously, or committing crimes is not the best idea.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn sich dein Charakter im Sichtbereich des Feindes aufhält. Verdächtiges Verhalten, das Ziehen von Waffen oder Verbrechen zu begehen, sind nicht die besten Ideen.

Source: Visible if your character is wanted. Its fill level represents how much heat your character has, which reduces over time as you remain hidden.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn dein Charakter gesucht wird.Der Füllstand der Anzeige gibt an, wie hoch dein Fahndungslevel ist. Verringert sich mit der Zeit, solange du außer Sicht bleibst.

Source:
Character status is indicated by various icons shown on the HUD in the upper-right corner of the screen.
Depending on your difficulty settings, some of the indicators listed below may not be displayed in your game.
Translation:
Der Charakterstatus wird durch verschiedene Symbole angezeigt, welche auf deinem HUD in der oberen rechten Ecke des Bildschirms zu sehen sind.
Abhängig von deinen Schwierigkeitseinstellungen, werden manche dieser Symbole während des Spiels möglicherweise nicht angezeigt.

Source: Visible if your character has been detected as a threat and is within enemy sight. If you are at a distance, concealed, or in the dark, it will take longer for the enemies to recognize you. When this happens, the icon will gradually fill up, giving you a brief chance to hide.
Translation: Sichtbar, wenn dein Charakter als Bedrohung erkannt wurde und sich innerhalb der Sichtweite des Feindes aufhält. Auf Entfernung, in Deckung oder im Dunkeln wird es länger dauern, bis der Feind dich erkennt. Wenn dies passiert, wird sich das Symbol allmählich füllen, und du bekommst die Chance, dich zu verstecken.

Source: You can command a squad using the vanilla commanding system. Your subordinates are persistent and in multiplayer sessions enter and exit the game with you. If your character dies, your squad will become detached. Any player, including you, can take command over a detached fighter by approaching them and using an action. Therefore, you can regain command if you return to your former squad with a new character quickly enough. A detached squad will disappear if there is no one nearby for a certain time.

Placeable objects are smaller props that are paid for in money by the placing person. If an item can be owned, it will be automatically linked to the person placing it (for example: item storages). Right now placed items cannot be moved or removed.

Construction includes placement of various items in the world and building structures. Both these actions are available via radial menu, but will only appear if your character is equipped with an entrenching tool. Moreover, construction is only possible at operating bases controlled by the resistance.

Buildable structures cost resources, which are taken from the location storage. Right now raised structures cannot be moved or removed. Structures belong to the resistance in general and are not linked to the specific person constructing them.

There are many areas that are forbidden to enter for civilians. Any players spotted in these areas will be instantly shot and hunted. Depending on your settings, these areas will be marked in red on your map and/or you will see a status icon on your HUD upon entering them. There is no need to frantically check your map to avoid entering them by accident - they are usually fenced and accompany military bases, outposts, factories, and other military or strategic points of interest.
Military personnel is allowed to be present within illegal zones. You can disguise yourself in enemy uniform to walk around freely.
Translation: Militärischem Personal ist es erlaubt, sich in Sperrzonen aufzuhalten. Du kannst dich mit einer feindlichen Uniform verkleiden, um frei herumlaufen zu können.

Source: If you are extremely desperate, you can try extorting defenceless civilians. This should be your last resort, as it turns them hostile against you and makes you lose their hard-earned support.
Translation: Falls du extrem verzweifelt bist, kannst du versuchen, hilflose Zivilisten zu erpressen. Das sollte nur dein letzter Ausweg sein, da sie sich dann gegen dich wenden und du ihre hart-verdiente Unterstützung verlierst.

Source: Money makes the world go around and it is no different in *Freedom Fighters*. You will need it to buy gear, supplies, hire subordinates and expand your bases. Amount of possessed money can be checked at any moment by opening the inventory menu.
Translation: Geld regiert die Welt, in *Freedom Fighters* ist dies nicht anders. Es wird benötigt, um Ausrüstung und Vorräte zu kaufen, sowie Untergebene anzuheuern und Basen zu erweitern. In deinem Inventar kannst du jederzeit nachsehen, wie viel Geld du besitzt.

Source: Your money is virtual, which means there is no in-game wallet item and your balance is tied to your player profile. What happens with your balance in case of your character death depends on your difficulty settings - ranging from no penalty, through fixed fee, to a complete loss.
Translation: Dein Geld ist virtuell, was bedeutet, dass es im Spiel keine Brieftasche gibt und dein Kontostand an dein Spielerprofil gebunden ist. Was nach dem Tod deines Charakters mit deinem Kontostand geschieht, ist von deinem Schwierigkeitsgrad abhängig - von meiner Strafe, über eine gesetzte Summe, bis zum kompletten Verlust.

Source:
Earning methods
There are multiple ways to make money, but collecting enemy dogtags and turning them in to the resistance is the most rewarding one. You can also sell equipment looted from the enemy.
Translation:
Verdienstmöglichkeiten
Es gibt mehrere Möglichkeiten, Geld zu verdienen. Die lohnenswerteste ist das Sammeln und Einreichen feindlicher Dogtags. Du kannst auch vom Feind geplünderte Ausrüstung verkaufen.

Source: You can select the currency used in your run during game setup. Selected currency format has no effect on the gameplay and is purely a cosmetic/role-playing change.
Translation: Während der anfänglichen Spieleinstellung kann das Format der Währung eingestellt werden. Das ausgewählte Format hat keine Auswirkungen auf den Spielverlauf und ist rein kosmetisch bzw. für Rollenspiel-Zwecke.

Source:
Transferring
You can transfer money to another freedom fighter by accessing the radial menu and selecting the Transfer money option. To do so, you need to be in the immediate vicinity of the recipient. After money is sent, the transferee will receive a notification mentioning the sender name and amount of money received.

To acquire ownership over an item, it must have no prior owner. In that case, you will see a Claim ownership action on the item. Just use it to claim the item as your own. If you are placing objects and the object can be owned, you will automatically claim ownership over it.

Sometimes you may also want to pass the ownership to another player, for example if you are building containers for your squad. In that case you can use Abandon ownership action to release the item. Afterwards, it can be claimed by any other player. Abandoning the item will also automatically unlock it.

Various items in the world can be owned by freedom fighters — such as containers placed in operating bases and vehicles found in the world. The owner can lock the item, restricting other players’ access. Both lock state and ownership is persisted. This is useful if you want to keep your personal belongings secure, or make sure no reckless driver hijacks your valuable vehicle at a resistance base.

Basic features available via the radial menu include:
- Accessing journal, containing details about your current tasks
- Accessing campaign progress menu, which lists your high-level objectives required to win the uprising
- Transferring money to nearby freedom fighters
- Accessing placing and construction menus
- Accessing placing and construction menus

Open the radial menu by pressing U to access various features specific to *Freedom Fighters*. This menu is context-aware,
which means the options available within the menu may depend on your character state, objects in your vicinity,
equipped tools and other. When additional options are available, you will usually see an on-screen prompt
in the lower part of your screen.

You can use any handheld radio to communicate with the resistance. To do so, you must equip the radio in hand and interact with it using the radial menu. You will see a call to action when the interaction is available. Remember to turn the radio on and tune it to required frequency. You also need to be within range of a controlled radio site.

After joining the fight for the first time, or after an unfortunate death, the player will be faced with the deployment map tool. In this view, they can select the respawn location they wish to use. If there is no location available, the player has to wait until remaining players reenable respawn availability. If there are no remaining players alive, the campaign will fail.

To spawn in a town, there must be at least one supporter in the local population. By spawning, the player takes control of a civilian character that is taken away from the supporters amount. Town population is not affected by this.

Spawning at operating bases consumes a certain amount of resources, depending on the operating base type. Respawn cost, along with available resources at the base, is always shown in the deployment map tool.
Spawned character will have a mix of resistance clothes and no equipment at all.
Translation: Der neue Charakter wird mit einem Mix aus Widerstandskleidung, allerdings ohne Ausrüstung ausgestattet.

Source: Spawned character will have civilian clothes, a basic handgun, a map and some bag.
Translation: Der neue Charakter wird mit Zivilkleidung und einer Tasche, sowie einer Karte und Handfeuerwaffe ausgestattet.

Source: You can use most beds found in the world to rest. Resting advances time, which is useful if you want to skip night-time or, to the contrary, you want to carry out an assault in the dark.

Additionally:
- Character cannot be wanted
- If character is in combat attire, there cannot be enemies nearby
- Bed cannot be in illegal area

To rest, you have to interact with a bed and select resting duration in the menu. In multiplayer, all players spawned in-world need to get near beds and confirm their readiness to rest. It is not possible to change planned rest duration while players are waiting. To do so, all players must cancel their readiness (or exit resting menu), which will clear currently planned rest.
Once all required players are ready, a timelapse will occur, fast-forwarding by the selected duration.
Each player needs to have a wristwatch in order to wake up at the planned time.
Translation: Jeder Spieler muss im Besitz einer Armbanduhr sein, um zur geplanten Zeit wach zu werden.

Source:
Depending on your difficulty settings, resting may heal player characters.
Damage is healed in full, independently of the rest duration.
Translation:
Abhängig von deinen Schwierigkeitseinstellungen kann das Ausruhen deinen Charakter heilen.
Schaden wird vollständig geheilt, unabhängig von der Dauer des Ruhens.

Source: Depending on your difficulty settings, you will see a status icon when your character is undercover.
Translation: Abhängig von deinen Schwierigkeitseinstellungen wirst du ein Statussymbol sehen können, wenn dein Charakter undercover ist.

Source: By wearing complete enemy uniform your character can go undercover. In this state, you can enter illegal areas, openly carry weapons (if the weapon belongs to the enemy faction), and drive enemy vehicles without attracting attention. The cover can be blown if you act suspiciously or open fire.

When starting a new game, you can modify various settings to adjust the difficulty and mechanics to your play style. Although these are collectively called difficulty settings, some of the choices are rather a matter of preference. Right now those settings can only be adjusted when starting a new campaign.

You can quickly change all settings by selecting one of the predefined presets. Selecting a preset does not prevent you from adjusting the settings further – if you change any of the options, the preset selector will automatically switch to Custom, retaining all other settings from the preset. This way you can use any of the presets as a starting point.
If this is your first playthrough, we recommend using Normal preset to experience a balanced gameplay the way it was envisioned.

Whether you launch via single player scenario, host a local server or set up a dedicated server, new Freedom Fighters game is started using an ingame UI. All three playing methods are supported. Moreover, you can freely switch between single player and a locally hosted server – your campaign progres will carry over seamlessly.

If there is no saved data present, all joining players will see a pre game screen. If you are playing on a dedicated server, you need to log in as an admin to configure the game and launch it. This is automatic for single players and local hosts.

- player faction: the resistance faction. Irregular forces that will use a mix of their own and allied faction equipment.
- enemy faction: the occupier faction. Regular and organized army, controlling all significant points on the map, with no shortage of assets.
- allied faction: external power that supplies the resistance with political and military aid. Not directly present in the world, but the resistance may have access to some of its weapons and vehicles.
- civilian faction: the local population, present in towns and non-military facilities. Depending on world events, specific characters may become supporters of the resistance or occupier forces and become involved.

During pre game you can select faction configuration and multiple difficulty options. Setup and difficulty settings cannot be changed later. Ability to change difficulty settings during a campaign will be added in future.

Other settings
You can also change the displayed format of the ingame currency to your liking. This is purely a cosmetic feature and has no impact on the actual gameplay mechanics.

Due to many additional features, Freedom Fighters is not automatically compatible with modded factions. In the base version, you can play as FIA, and choose between USA and USSR in allied and occupier faction roles. Support for outstanding community created factions will be added in future.

Vehicles found in the world are not persistent by default – regardless whether you capture them on the go, or hijack from a parking spot. To preserve a vehicle during save/load, you have to assign it to a parking spot in a garage or a helipad at a controlled operating base.

If your character dies, their body will be persisted after you disconnect or exit, enabling you to return to it. But if you lose your next character, the previous body will be removed – only the last body is preserved.

Freedom Fighters is a semi-persistent scenario, which means that overall game progress is saved, but not the exact state of the world. Global save is performed periodically every 10 minutes to protect players from losing progress due to a fatal crash, and on every server exit (or closing the game in single player). In multiplayer, the player profile is saved on player disconnect.
This means that every fight counts and you can effectively clear garrisons by war of attrition, small chunks at a time.
Claiming ownership of a vehicle does not affect its persistence.
Translation: Den Besitztum über ein Fahrzeug zu beanspruchen beeinflusst nicht dessen Persistenz.

Source: Your AI subordinates are saved with your character. In multiplayer they will join and leave the server with you.

Specific enemy characters are not saved, so if you exit the game while surrounded by enemies, they will be gone after you load the game. Garrison compositions are however saved, which means if you attack a place of interest and eliminate a single enemy, that specific character will not automatically reappear. If you clear a location, but do not capture it, it will remain empty after the load – of course, unless enemy reinforcements arrive!

If you abandon a vehicle in the world and get sufficiently far away, it may be gone once you get back! Assigning the vehicle to a parking spot also prevents this. Additionally, you will be able to recover the vehicle from far away.
Your character position and inventory is fully saved. On return you will spawn at the same location you have exited, so make sure to exit the game while in a safe location!

Proceed to the factory and clear the enemy garrison. You’ll likely face heavy resistance, but you can tackle it in stages. If you’re playing solo, consider using a sniper rifle to harass enemies from a distance, frequently changing position to avoid detection. In other situations, a frontal assault with AI squadmates may be effective.

Getting supplies becomes much easier once you’ve captured your first factory. It will passively produce new supplies each day, which you can transport to your FOBs, hideouts, or donate to towns. Factories continue production even when you skip time by resting in beds, so you can use this mechanism at moments of downtime. You should now focus on capturing additional factories to maximize your production throughput.

Your next priority should be to establish a network of hideouts across all towns. To do this, you need to increase support in each of them. Don’t focus on a single location – instead, spread your efforts: hang posters in town A, donate supplies in town B, move on to town C, and eventually return to A. This rotation helps avoid diminishing returns and keeps the threat level moderately low.

Now you’re ready to capture an enemy factory. Choose one near your FOB, or establish a new one. Make sure it’s stocked with weapons, ammunition, and medical items – either bring them manually or provide enough supplies so they can be purchased from the armory, medical tent, or other facilities. Set up a garage and park at least two vehicles. Whether you’re playing solo or with others, you can also build a living area to command a squad of recruits during the assault.

Once you have a steady surplus of supplies, you can start taking over towns and military bases using the same process – ultimately leading to the liberation of all territories and victory in the campaign.

Start by completing the introductory storyline. By the end of it, you should have established your first FOB and learned how to earn money by collecting enemy dogtags, as well as how to raise support by hanging propaganda posters.

Once you clear the garrison and enter the factory area, a battle will begin. Thanks to your hideout network, friendly fighters should arrive to help even the odds. If your character is killed, you’ll be able to quickly respawn at your FOB, grab a vehicle, and return to the battle before it’s lost.

Every new hideout will make your life a little easier – reducing travel time to resupply, pick up posters, or report mission progress. Once your hideouts are established, stock them with supplies, including your HQ. Resupplied hideouts enable the resistance to dispatch fighters who can assist in capturing key points of interest.

Placing posters and talking to people may not be enough in towns with larger populations. The most effective method is donating supplies, which at this point can be obtained in one of the following ways:
- Purchase with money at ports: Earn money by turning in dogtags, completing resistance missions, or selling loot at shops.
- Raid an enemy factory: Go in guns blazing, or infiltrate undercover and casually drive off with the cargo.
- Ambush enemy transports: Enemy trucks may carry varying amounts of supplies.
- Loot enemy checkpoints: Occasionally, you may find a pile of supplies nearby.

In the meantime, consider capturing radio and radar sites, which will help you consolidate your control over territory. This makes traveling safer, as enemy patrols will only appear in zones still under their control.
Make sure to have at least one dose of epinephrine on you. It can be self-administered if you get downed, which is crucial for lone wolves.
Bloodied clothes will make you wanted on sight. If your clothes are bloodied, you will see a hint on the inventory screen.

Enemy garrisons will usually outnumber you or your group, but don’t worry – every attack and every eliminated  enemy counts, and eventually you will win the war of attrition. Apply hit & run tactics – approach a base, snipe a few enemies, send a rocket and vanish in the woods. Rinse and repeat.
You can use public payphones to report resistance activity and lure the enemy into an ambush, or provoke a battle.
You can also steal supplies from an enemy factory without capturing it. Likewise, create distraction, drive up in an enemy cargo truck while disguised, load supplies and get away quickly!
You can purchase civilian clothes in a clothing shop. It may be useful to store a few sets at your military base, so you can disguise as a civilian after respawning.

Before trying to capture an enemy base, build a FOB nearby and stock it with resources to respawn there. Place a garage and assign a vehicle that will act as a taxi. Even if your entire squad dies and the vehicle stays left on the battlefield, you will be able to recover it remotely from the FOB. In this manner you will be able to deliver reinforcements sustainably.
Make sure to stock your hideouts fully before attempting to capture a town or a military base. The supplies will allow friendlies to take part in the battle.

You can use any handheld radio to contact the resistance officer if you are within signal range of a controlled radio site. Remember to tune your radio to correct frequency according to the timetable.
The HQ will be shut down and moved to a new location if you endanger it. Any stocked supplies will be lost in the process, wasting the resistance efforts.
Passing ambulances may contain significant amounts of medical items, including epinephrine, in their trunks. Medics may also carry epinephrine.

You can capture enemy APCs or helicopters in the early game. Scout the location and ask for distraction at the other side of the enemy compound. Disguise yourself in enemy uniform to enter the illegal zone freely and hijack the vehicle, while everyone’s attention is elsewhere.

Do not get into a fight if you don’t have a way out. Situation usually escalates very quickly and you may find yourself surrounded and overwhelmed, even if you had the upper hand at the start. Have an exit strategy and don’t be afraid to break contact. You can always come later and try again.

At any point, you can check your campaign progress using the radial menu accessed by and selecting the appropriate option. Note that total progress includes optional objectives, not required for victory, therefore it is possible to finish the campaign without reaching 100% completion.

The resistance will be defeated if no freedom fighter is alive, and there is no respawn location available in the world. This can be caused by lack of resources, lack of population support, being overrun with enemies, or other reasons depending on the respawn location type. Look up Respawn in FM to learn more.

Freedom Fighters is an open-world campaign, but not open-ended. There are specific conditions in which your uprising will either achieve victory or defeat. When this happens, the campaign will end and you will have to start all over.
Translation: Freedom Fighters ist eine Open World-Kampagne, die jedoch kein offenes Ende hat. Es gibt bestimmte Bedingungen, die deinem l Aufstand entweder Sieg oder Niederlage bescheren wird. Sobald dies geschehen ist, ist die Kampagne vorbei und du musst von Vorne beginnen.

Source:
In order to reach victory, the resistance has to have control over or neutralize all of the following points of interest:
- towns
- factories
- military bases
- radio towers
- radar sites
Only with all of the above will the resistance have enough political and military power to upkeep its rule.
Translation: Nur mit allem oben genannten wird der Widerstand ausreichend politische und militärische Macht besitzen, um seine Herrschaft aufrecht zu erhalten.

Source: Each supporter will donate a small amount of money to the resistance every day. The funds are then split equally and sent to all present freedom fighters automatically.

Population support is required indirectly to finish the campaign. Without it, you won’t be able to control all required points of interest. It counts towards the progress, so you need to convince every single person to reach 100%.

Civilian population is a key element in your revolution. After all, it is their freedom you are fighting for. Just incidentally they also happen to fuel your efforts with money and manpower. Each civilian may have one of the following stances regarding revolution:
- supporting: friendly to the resistance members and disapproving of the occupier.
- neutral: no stance, the initial state for most of the population. They don’t really care about the revolution or the occupier forces. They can be turned into supporters, given enough reasons to.
- hostile: actively against the revolution and supporting the occupier. They cannot be turned into supporters, but given enough time they may become neutral.

You can inspect general population stats in the campaign progress menu. To check local trends, inspect selected town on the map. Population composition is represented by a progress bar, with color-coded segments proportional to the popularity of relevant stance.

Population moods will change in reaction to your actions. While civilians are rather tolerant to acts of war and inconveniences caused by combat against the occupier, any wrongdoings towards them will turn them hostile very quickly. Keep in mind your supporters may become hostile just as well, negating your hard-earned friendliness.

Free stuff is an excellent method to gain supporters, whether you are a politician, or… a politician-to-be.  If you win the revolution, of course. The downside is that you actually have to bring the stuff to the table.  But here comes the good news – when it’s free, nobody will ask you how you got it.

Donating supplies is a rather expensive method, unless you have a surplus of your own production. Supplies are also vital to your own operations, so giving them away in the early stages of the revolution may not be the best choice.
Translation: Das Spenden von Vorräten ist eine eher teure Methode, sofern du keinen Überschuss aus deiner eigenen Produktion hast. Vorräte sind ebenfalls wichtig für deine eigenen Operationen, sie also in frühen Phase der Revolution wegzugeben wäre möglicherweise nicht die beste Wahl.

Source:
There is no limit as to how many supplies and how often you can donate to a specific town, but many donations over a short period of time will stop having an effect on the support. It’s best to diversify and distribute the supplies evenly to many towns in a concurrent manner. Donation effects wear out after some time, so you can come back
and donate another shipment later.

Load your vehicle with supplies and drive to the exact location of the town marker, as shown on your map. Come to a full stop once you are within 50 meters from the marker. A prompt should appear, and the donation option will be available in the radial menu.
Translation: Belade dein Fahrzeug mit Vorräten und fahre zur exakten Position des Stadtsymbols, welches auf deiner Karte angezeigt wird. Bringe dein Fahrzeug zum Stehen, sobald du innerhalb eines Radius von 50 Metern um das Symbol herum befindest. Auf deinem Bildschirm wird dann eine Aufforderung zum Abladen angezeigt, und die Option zur Spende wird in deinem Radialmenü verfügbar werden.

Source: Once convinced to support the resistance, civilians will not change their mind on their own.  Remember that each supporter can still turn hostile if you give them a good enough reason to. Opposite to supporters, civilians will typically turn hostile immediately in response to your actions. In that case, there is nothing you can do to change their mind except for waiting.
Translation: Einmal überzeugt, den Widerstand zu unterstützen, werden Zivilisten nicht von sich aus ihre Meinung ändern. Bedenke, dass jeder Unterstützer sich am Ende dir gegen über feindselig verhalten kann, wenn du ihm einen guten Grund dazu gibst. Im Vergleich zu Unterstützern, werden reguläre Zivilisten sich typischerweise dir gegenüber sofort feindselig stimmen, als Resultat deiner Aktionen. In diesem Fall kannst du nichts weiter tun als abwarten, bis sie sich wieder beruhigt haben.

Source: Placing up posters is a very effective early method to raise awareness about your revolution and gain support. It’s more time-effective than personal agitation, as you can reach many people with a single poster.
Translation: Plakate aufzuhängen ist gerade am Anfang der Revolution eine sehr effektive Methode, um Aufmerksamkeit für sie zu erregen und somit auch Unterstützer dazu zu gewinnen. Es ist auch eine zeitsparendere Weise, Aufmerksamkeit zu erregen, als persönliche mit einzelnen Personen zu reden, da du mit einem einzigen Plakat mehr Menschen erreichen kannst.

Source: There is a trade-off however, as the amount of posters – and thus the support you can generate this way – is limited. As the posters are meant to be visible – they are also visible to enemy forces too, and will raise the local threat level.
Translation: Es gibt jedoch eine Kehrseite. Die Menge an Plakaten, die man aufhängen kann, ist begrenzt - und daher auch die Unterstützung, die man mit ihnen generieren kann. Da Plakate in der Öffentlichkeit aufgehängt werden müssen, werden sie in der Konsequenz auch den Besatzern auffallen, und steigern somit auch das lokale Bedrohungslevel.

Source: Distributing propaganda is a crime, and doing it within enemy sight will make you wanted.
Translation: Die Verbreitung von Propaganda ist ein Verbrechen, dies in Sichtweite von Feinden zu tun wird dich gesucht machen.

Source: Posters can be obtained from resistance officers using the relevant dialogue option.
Translation: Plakate können bei Widerstandsoffizieren mit der passenden Dialogoption abgeholt werden.

Source: To place a poster, you need to equip it in your left hand (just like any other item). You will see a ghost of the poster in front of you. The ghost color will change to gray if the placement is valid, and yellow if it cannot be placed.
Translation: Um ein Plakat aufzuhängen, musst du es in der linken Hand ausrüsten (wie jeden anderen Gegenstand auch). Vor dir wird eine Schablone angezeigt; sie wird grau, wenn die Platzierung gültig ist, und gelb, wenn sie nicht möglich ist.

Source: Postering all spots is not required to finish the campaign, but is required to reach 100% completion.
Translation: Um die Kampagne zu beenden ist es nicht erforderlich, alle Orte zu plakatieren, allerdings wird dies notwendig, wenn man 100% Fortschritt erreichen will.

Source: Posters can only be attached to specific objects (usually boards, signs, cabinets, advertising columns and similar), which are marked on your map with a posterable icon. Once an item has been postered, the icon is removed.
Translation: Plakate können nur an bestimmten Objekten befestigt werden (z.B. schwarze Bretter, Schilder, Vitrinen, Litfaßsäulen u.ä.), welche auf deiner Karte mit einem Plakatsymbol gekennzeichnet sind. Sobald eines dieser Objekte plakatiert worden ist, verschwindet dieses Symbol.

Source:
There are multiple ways to gain support, including:
- direct agitation by approaching and talking to individual persons
- placing up propaganda posters to increase visibility and awareness
- donating supplies to townsfolk
Translation:
Es gibt verschiedene Wege, um Unterstützung aufzubauen. Diese beinhalten:
-gezieltes Ansprechen von Personen
- das Aufhängen von Propagandaplakaten
- das Spenden von Vorräten an die Bevölkerung

Source: Gaining support is a process which takes time. Most actions will not yield immediate results, but will resonate  over time instead. For example, if you place posters, it takes some time for them to be noticed. If you donate supplies, it takes some time for the word to spread around, and so on. You can inspect towns on the map to view currently active effects and their expiration time. Once an effect expires, it will stop attracting new supporters and will be removed.
Translation: Unterstützung zu gewinnen ist ein zeitaufwändiger Prozess. Die meisten Aktionen werden keine unmittelbaren Ergebnisse liefern, werden sich aber mit der Zeit zeigen. Zum Beispiel, wenn du Plakate aufhängst, braucht es ein wenig, bis sie bemerkt werden. Wenn du Vorräte spendest, wird es Zeit brauchen, bis sich das Wort verbreitet usw. . Du kannst auf deiner Karte die Städte inspizieren, um aktive Effekte und ihre Verfallszeit einzusehen. Sobald ein Effekt ausläuft, wird er keine neuen Unterstützer mehr anziehen und entfernt.

Source: Some methods are described in detail in their dedicated Field Manual pages.
Translation: Manche Methoden werden in ihrem eigenen Feldhandbuch-Eintrag genau beschrieben.

Source: Factories are crucial for your revolution, as they can provide a steady stream of resources, which are much needed for any war efforts.
Translation: Fabriken sind ausschlaggebend für eure Revolution, da sie einen stetigen Fluss an Ressourcen bieten, welche für jede Kriegsanstrengung dringend benötigt werden.

Source: Each factory controlled by the resistance will produce certain resources, depending on the factory type. Those resources may then be freely utilized by freedom fighters as deemed fit. On each factory area there is at least one resource storage, in which the produced resources are placed. Those storages are always marked on the map and feature a sign.

Factories are usually guarded by an enemy forces garrison. Once the garrison is cleared and the area is secured, a battle will follow. Be careful, as during factory working hours civilian workers will be present in the factory area. After repelling enemy forces the resistance will take control over the factory. All factories must be controlled by the resistance in order to achieve victory.

Military bases are the backbone of enemy occupation over the area. All bases need to be controlled by the resistance    to achieve victory, but be warned, they are heavily guarded and the enemy won’t let control over them easily.
In order to take control, the resistance has to win a battle over the base. A battle can be initiated by interacting with the military base flag post.
Once under resistance control, the military base becomes resistance’s operating base, which means the resistance may start construction in its area. See relevant Field Manual section for more info.

Radar sites cannot be captured by the resistance, only neutralized. To do so, the resistance has to destroy all radar dishes present on the site. Even if the defending garrison is cleared without damage to the equipment, the resistance has no qualified crews to operate the installations.
Radar sites are operated by the enemy and need to be neutralized to achieve victory. With enemy radar sites in operation, allied forces are not able to provide required support.
Translation: Radarstellungen werden vom Feind betrieben und müssen neutralisiert werden, um zu gewinnen. Solange feindliche Radarstellungen in Betrieb sind, werden verbündete Kräfte nicht in der Lage sein die benötigte Unterstützung zu leisten.

Source: Radio towers are always guarded by an enemy garrison. To take control, the resistance has to simply secure the area by clearing its garrison.
Translation: Funktürme werden immer durch feindliche Truppen bewacht. Um die Kontrolle zu erlangen, müssen diese einfach ausgeschaltet werden.

Source: Radio towers are used to enable communication for the controlling faction and jam opposing forces. All radio towers need to be either neutralized or controlled by the resistance to achieve victory. Towers may be destroyed, in which case neither side will control it. This also counts towards campaign progress.

On the other hand, sometimes you may want to increase threat and provoke a response from the enemy deliberately, for example to contest town control. In this case, some warning shots in the air or an ambush on a random enemy vehicle should be enough. You can also locate the nearest phone booth and report resistance activity in the town.

Threat level denotes how much trouble the resistance has been recently making. The bigger the threat, the more activity from enemy forces you can expect. Killings, shootings, and even sightings of resistance fighters will rapidly increase threat. Threat will decay over time, so if you are facing too much enemy activity, it is best to change the area of operations for some time and come back later.

Towns are key places for your revolution. Most importantly, they are the home of the local population, whose support is desperately needed. Towns come in three sizes: villages, towns and cities, based on the number of residents and their infrastructure.

To control a town, the resistance has to have a certain amount of supporters among the town residents. Detailed information is always shown in the town info panel. Raising support is enough to control villages, but in the case of bigger settlements, enemy forces will not stay indifferent. When the town’s threat level gets sufficiently high, the occupier will attempt to pacify the town and a battle will begin. As a result, the winning side will take control over the town.
Be wary that the resistance will lose control over a town if the population support falls below a certain threshold.

Friendly fighters are resistance members or supporting civilians that decided to take part in the fight. They will appear during battles over various points of interest, such as towns, military bases, factories and others. They are autonomous and you cannot directly control them, but they will fight along side you with the enemy. However, their presence depends on your actions, as each fighter needs to be equipped with weapons and ammunition, and that in turn requires supplies.

Friendly fighters consume supplies stored at hideouts. If the location being fought for hosts a hideout – such as a town – then the fighters will appear and take supplies only from that specific hideout. Otherwise – when attacking factories or military bases – the supplies are consumed across all resistance hideouts, including the HQ. Supplies stored at resistance operating bases (FOBs, military bases) and controlled factories are not taken into account.
Hideout officers also offer guns, ammunition, and other war materials – all available in exchange for money.
Translation: Die Widerstandsoffiziere in Verstecken bieten auch Waffen, Munition und andere Kriegsmaterialien - alles im Austausch für Geld.

Source: There is always one HQ hideout in the world. However, if you endanger it, it will cease operations and must be relocated. This process may take several hours, during which the HQ will be inaccessible. Any supplies stored there will be lost during the move, so take care to avoid triggering a relocation.
Translation: Es gibt immer ein HQ-Versteck in der Spielwelt. Allerdings kann es passieren, dass es den Betrieb einstellt und umziehen muss, wenn du es in Gefahr bringst. Dieser Prozess kann ein paar Stunden dauern, währenddessen ist das HQ nicht verfügbar. Alle dort gelagerten Vorräte gehen während des Umzugs verloren, also vermeide es, einen Umzug zu provozieren.

Source: The HQ’s location is not automatically revealed on your map. To discover its position, you must either call the HQ using a phone or contact it via radio, and then travel to the coordinates you are given.
Translation: Der Ort des Hauptquartiers wird nicht automatisch auf der Karte angezeigt. Um seine Position zu entdecken, musst du das HQ entweder per Telefon oder Funkgerät kontaktieren, und im Anschluss zu den Koordinaten reisen, die man dir mitgeteilt hat.

Source: HQ hideouts are established in safer locations – typically in remote houses away from densely populated areas or in small, secluded settlements. They serve as delivery and pickup points for various resistance operations and act as rally points where mercenary fighters can be recruited.
Translation: HQ-Verstecke sind an sichereren Orten etabliert - für gewöhnlich in abgelegenen Häusern oder kleinen Siedlungen. Sie fungieren als Liefer- und Abholstellen für diverse Widerstandsoperationen und dienen als Sammelpunkte, wo Söldner rekrutiert werden können.

Source: Hideouts are secure locations used by the resistance for meetings and covert communication. At each hideout, you can meet a resistance officer – your primary contact for all conspiratorial matters. Speak with them to receive new assignments. Keep in mind that they’re not particularly fond of attracting attention from the authorities, so avoid visiting them when you have heat on you.
Translation: Verstecke sind sichere Orte, die vom Widerstand für Treffen und verdeckte Kommunikation genutzt werden. In jedem Versteck kannst du einen Widerstandsoffizier antreffen - dein primärer Kontakt für alle verschwörerischen Angelegenheiten. Sprich mit ihm, um neue Aufträge zu erhalten. Behalte im Hinterkopf, dass sie nicht gerade erpicht darauf sind, Aufmerksamkeit durch die Behörden zu erregen. Vermeide also einen besuch, wenn du zur Fahndung ausgeschrieben bist.

Source: The resistance will establish hideouts in towns and cities once there is enough local support to sustain its operations. Same goes the other way – if you lose too much support, resistance operations will become unsustainable and the hideout will be dissolved. Keeping a network of hideouts is very important, as each additional hideout means more storage space for supplies, which are used to arm your fighters during battles.
Translation: Der Widerstand wird in Städten ein Versteck etablieren, sobald die Unterstützung in der Stadtbevölkerung groß genug ist, um den Betrieb aufrecht zu erhalten. Das selbe gilt auch anders herum - sollte der Widerstand zu viel Unterstützung verlieren, werden Widerstandsoperationen unhaltbar und das Versteck in der Folge aufgegeben. Es ist wichtig, ein Netzwerk von Verstecken zu erhalten, da jedes zusätzliche Versteck mehr Lagerplatz für Vorräte bietet, welche nötig sind, um Kämpfer während einer Schlacht zu bewaffnen.

Source: Missions and their progress is, at any stage, fully persistent. It is a good idea to look up the journal upon joining an existing online session to check out if there are any already started missions.
Translation: Missionen und ihr Fortschritt sind zu jeder Zeit persistent. Es ist eine gute Idee, nach dem Beitritt in eine Onlinesitzung ins Journal zu schauen, ob es ob es laufende Missionen gibt.

Source: You can receive missions by talking to the resistance officer. Missions are shared by all ingame players and it does not matter which player takes or reports them. If the mission is awarded with money, the amount is automatically split between all ingame players.
Translation: Missionen können bei einem Widerstandsoffizier erteilt werden. Missionen werden von allen im Spiel präsenten Spielern geteilt und es ist egal, welcher Spieler sie anfragt oder beendet. Sollte die Mission eine Belohnung enthalten, wird diese bei Abschluss automatisch unter allen im Spiel befindlichen Spielern aufgeteilt.

Source: You can recruit resistance fighters at HQ hideouts existing in the world or living areas constructed by players at the resistance operating bases. Recruited fighters can be commanded as members of your squad.
Translation: Du kannst Widerstandskämpfer am HQ-Versteck in der Spielwelt oder in von Spielern errichteten Wohnquartieren in einer Widerstandsbasis rekrutieren. Rekrutierte Kämpfer können als Truppmitglieder kommandiert werden.

Source: Phones can be used to make calls to known contacts using the phonebook, or by dialling a number manually. Once phone is interacted with, a radial menu will appear enabling to choose the preferred method.
Translation: Telefone können benutzt werden, um Mithilfe des Telefonbuchs bekannte Kontakte anzurufen, oder indem man manuell eine Nummer wählt. Sobald man mit dem Telefon interagiert, erscheint ein Radialmenü und erlaubt die, die bevorzugte Methode auszuwählen.

Source: Ports can be used to import supplies from abroad, an essential resource representing various commodities essential both for everyday life and development of your facilities. Supplies can be bought for money after interacting with the storage area sign. Each port has a limited storage of supplies, but after a few days the stock should be replenished. Port storages are independent from each other and are refilled independently.
Once supplies are purchased, they will be placed in the pickup area. Don’t worry if you can’t haul all goods in one go – those supplies are secure and will be waiting for pickup after you return.
Translation: Sobald die Vorräte gekauft wurden, werden sie im Abholbereich platziert. Keine Sorge - wenn du nicht alle Vorräte in einem Rutsch mitnehmen kannst, wird der Rest weiterhin verfügbar sein, sobald du zurückkehrst.

Source: Public transport can be used to quickly travel around the map. You can use busesv to travel on roads and ferries to navigate the water bodies. Every passenger has to buy a ticket each time they travel, price of which depends on the distance traveled. Sometimes certain stops may become temporarily unavailable, for example due to ongoing battles or administrative decisions of the authorities.
To travel, you have to appear as a civilian and cannot be wanted.
Translation: Um reisen zu können, musst du wie ein Zivilist gekleidet sein und darfst nicht gesucht sein.

Source: Various civilian shops can be found in the world, offering diverse assortment of goods. At general shops, you can buy various items intended for tourism, which are also incidentally useful if you plan to conduct guerilla warfare – such as compasses, watches or binoculars. Clothing shops may be useful if you want to get rid of your uniform and blend into the crowd. If you intend to be shot, make sure to visit the pharmacy beforehand.

While item stocks are limited, they usually get replenished before next business day begins. Shops will not want to serve you if you are wanted. Also keep in mind the current time of day – each shop has specific business hours, outside of which you will not be served.
Translation: Vorräte in Geschäften sind limitiert, werden allerdings für gewöhnlich vor Beginn des nächsten Werktages wieder aufgefüllt. Geschäfte werden dich nicht bedienen, solange du gesucht wirst. Halte auch die Tageszeit im Blick - jedes Geschäft hat spezifische Öffnungszeiten.

Source: Problems were detected with one or more of selected factions. Please report this problem to the integration author along with complete log files.
Translation: Es wurden Probleme mit einer oder mehreren ausgewählten Fraktionen festgestellt. Bitte melde dies dem für die Integration verantwortlichen Autor zusammen mit vollständigen Logdateien.

Source: An unknown error occured. Check logs for details and report this to the mod authors.
Translation: Ein unbekannter Fehler ist aufgetreten. Überprüfe die Logdateien für Einzelheiten und melde es den Modautoren.

Source: Scenario or terrain validation failed. Please report this problem to the scenario author along with a full set of log files.
Translation: Szenario- oder Terrainvalidierung fehlgeschlagen. Bitte melde das Problem dem Szenarioautor zusammen mit den vollständigen Logdateien.

Source:
Please keep in mind this project is in an early access state. Some features may not be fully developed yet, or may be temporary or placeholders.

Be sure to check out your journal and the Field Manual so you don't get lost.

If you have any questions or feedback, feel free to join our Discord community by scanning the code.

Good luck!
Translation:
Dieses Projekt befindet sich im Early Access. Einige Features sind möglicherweise noch nicht vollständig entwickelt, sind temporär oder dienen als Platzhalter.

Um dich nicht zu verirren, kannst du dein Journal und dein Feldhandbuch zur Hilfe nehmen.

Wenn du Fragen hast oder und Feedback geben möchtest, scanne den Code und tritt unserer Discord Community bei!

Viel Glück!

Source: Start an uprising and lead your people to freedom in this open-world persistent campaign.
Translation: Beginnen Sie einen Aufstand und führen Sie Ihr Volk in dieser anhaltenden Kampagne mit offener Welt zur Freiheit.

Source: Base amount received by players periodically from each supporter of the resistance.
Translation: Grundbetrag, welchen Spieler von jedem Unterstützer des Widerstands in regelmäßigen Abständen erhalten.

Source: Players will become wanted if they are seen in clothes bloodied above this level. Set to 0 to disable.
Translation: Spieler werden gesucht, sobald sie in blutverschmierter Kleidung gesehen werden, die diese Stufe überschreiten. Zum Deaktivieren auf 0 setzen.

Source: Enables an epinephrine injector item, which instantly recovers full health. Disabling this option on existing saves will not remove items from the world, but they will not be usable.
Translation: Aktiviert einen Adrenalin-Injektor, welcher den Anwender sofort und vollständig heilt. Diese Option zu deaktivieren auf bestehenden Speicherständen wird jene Gegenstände nicht aus der Spielwelt entfernen, jedoch werden sie unbrauchbar gemacht.

Source: Dynamically adjusts loot found on killed enemies, making scavenging for items more diverse and sustained use of enemy weapons more challenging. Disable if you want abundance of enemy equipment.
Translation: Passt dynamisch die Beute bei getöteten Feinden an, welches das Plündern von Gegenständen abwechslungsreicher und den anhaltenden Gebrauch feindlicher Waffen herausfordernder  gestaltet. Deaktiviere dies, falls du einen Überschuss an feindlicher Ausrüstung haben möchtest.

Source: Can the epinephrine be self-administered by a downed player.
Translation: Bestimmt, ob Adrenalin von einem bewusstlosen Spieler selbst verabreicht werden kann.

Source: How long does the player have to withstand in the downed state in order to self-administer epinephrine.
Translation: Bestimmt, wie lange der Spieler im Bewusstlosen-Status durchhalten muss, um sich Adrenalin selbst verabreichen zu können.

Source: How long does it take to lose maximum heat level (wanted state).
Translation: Bestimmt die Dauer, bis man sein Fahndungslevel losgeworden ist (Gesucht-Status).

Source: Automatically resupplies AI units with ammunition and consumable items as they are used. Enable for longer and more intense firefights, disable if you use other mods that enable AI to resupply autonomously.
Translation: Versorgt automatisch KI-Einheiten mit Munition und Verbrauchsgütern, nachdem sie genutzt wurden. Für längere und intensivere Feuergefechte aktivieren, deaktivieren falls du andere Mods verwendest, die KI-Einheiten autonom versorgt.

Source: Only relevant in multiplayer. If turned off, any already locked player containers will become accessible, but the ownership data is not cleared, and the setting may be reverted.
Translation: Nur im Mehrspielermodus relevant. Wenn ausgeschaltet, wird jeder verschlossene Behälter wieder zugänglich. Die Eigentümerdatei wird jedoch nicht gesäubert, und die Einstellung kann jederzeit rückgängig gemacht werden.

Source: Only relevant in multiplayer. If turned off, any already locked vehicles will become accessible, but the ownership data is not cleared, and the setting may be reverted.
Translation: Nur im Mehrspielermodus relevant. Wenn ausgeschaltet, wird jedes abgeschlossenes Fahrzeug zugänglich. D$ie Eigentümerdatei wird jedoch nicht gesäubert, und die Einstellung kann auch wieder rückgängig gemacht werden.

Source: Enable to treat players who are missing shirts, pants or shoes as combatants.
Translation: Aktivieren, damit Spieler, denen Oberteile, Hosen oder Schuhe fehlen, als Kombattanten behandelt werden.

Source: Displays status indicators of other players in their nametags. Specific indicators have to be also enabled in HUD section.
Translation: Zeigt Statusindikatoren für andere Spieler in ihren Nametags an. Bestimmte  Indikatoren müssen auch im HUD-Abschnitt aktiviert werden.

Source: Options other than Default require third person view to be enabled in Reforger server settings.
Translation: Andere Optionen als Standard erfordern die Aktivierung der Dritte-Person-Kamera in den Reforger-Servereinstellungen.

Source: Respawn money cost is not deducted if player's balance is below this threshold.
Translation: Die Kosten für den Wiedereinstieg werden nicht abgezogen, wenn der Kontostand eines Spielers diese Schwelle unterschreitet.

Translation: Einstieg als Widerstandskämpfer sollte folgende Gegenstände immer beinhalten:

Translation: Anzahl der Unterstützer, die pro Wiedereinstieg als Zivilist abgezogen werden.

Source: Higher stock levels allow faster early-game progression, since you can start raiding factories earlier. This only affects the initial allocation.
Translation: Größere Lagerstände erlauben schnelleren Fortschritt in der frühen Phase des Spiels, da du früher Fabriken überfallen kannst. Dies beeinflusst nur die anfängliche Menge.

Source: Resistance supporters act as respawn tickets. Increase this if you're playing in a larger group.
Translation: Unterstützer des Widerstands fungieren als Tickets für den Wiedereinstieg. Erhöhe diesen Wert, falls du mit einer größeren Gruppe spielst.

Source: Clustered distribution will place your initial supporters in the same region of the map. Spreaded will randomize them throughout entire map, which can make the beginning harder on large maps.
Translation: Konzentrierte Verteilung wird die anfänglichen Unterstützer in der selben Region platzieren. Zerstreut wird wird sie zufällig über der gesamten Karte verteilen, welches den Anfang auf größeren Karten herausfordernder macht.

Source: This amount is given to each new player on their first spawn.
Translation: Dieser Betrag wird jedem Spieler bei seinem ersten Einstieg gegeben.

Translation: Dieses Versteck ist aufgrund einer unmittelbaren Gefahr nicht in Betrieb.

Translation: Du kannst dies nicht tun, solange du bewaffnet oder in Uniform bist. Verstecke deine Waffe und/oder wechsle deine Kleidung.

Translation: Du kannst dies nicht tun, solange du gesucht wirst. warte, bis sich der Sturm gelegt hat und komme später wieder.

Translation: Dieses Fahrzeug ist zu groß für diesen Parkplatz.

Translation: Dieses Geschäft  ist derzeit geschlossen. Komme später innerhalb der Öffnungszeiten zurück.

Translation: Du hast keine Vorräte, die gespendet werden können.

Translation: Du hast der Stadt Vorräte gespendet.

Translation: %1, ein Zivilist, wurde in der Nähe von %2 getötet.
%1 wurde in der Nähe von %2 getötet.

Translation: %1 wurde durch Eigenbeschuss in der Nähe von %2 getötet.
